abstract: Neil Genzlinger reviews Sylvie Rokab documentary film Love Thy Nature.
lead_paragraph: Sylvie Rokab’s film, narrated by Liam Neeson, advocates redefining the relationship between humans and the natural world.

headline.main: Review: In ‘Love Thy Nature,’ It Takes a Planet
headline.print_headline: Review: In ‘Love Thy Nature,’ It Takes a Planet

snippet: Sylvie Rokab’s film, narrated by Liam Neeson, advocates redefining the relationship between humans and the natural world.
